summary: AN ORDINANCE amending the 2004 Adopted Budget, including the 2004-2009 Capital Improvement Program (CIP), and 2004 City position list; changing appropriations to various departments and funds in the Budget; making cash transfers between various City funds and subfunds; and abrogating positions.
sponsor: COMPTON, CONLIN, DELLA, DRAGO, GODDEN, AND MCIVER
